name: RocketRecoil
description:
Use the power of the rocket jump to complete levels. Just be careful because there's no way to control this immense power.
Complete seven levels to beat the game.

Inspired by rage inducing games like Getting Over, Jump King, and Maplestory Jump Quests, RocketRecoil is about the perseverance of the human spirit. Some could call it the Dark Souls of physics based platforming rage games. The first of its kind.
